channel.title: Can't Edit A Post After A Certain Time Limit
channel.description: Since I was the last to post in the RuneScape drops thread, I can't make a new post. So, I was going to edit my last post, but, there was no button to edit it. I got an edit link from one of my previous posts and put in the correct topic and message id, but it said I couldn't edit it because the time limit for edits has expired. When was a time limit for for edits added?

item.title: Can't Edit A Post After A Certain Time Limit
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

This was added when we upgraded the forum, I’ve increased it to one month now so it should cause less issues.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't Edit A Post After A Certain Time Limit
